name: crappie
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a fish found in fresh water in North American rivers, or its flesh eaten as food: We ate pan-fried crappie with wild rice and grain salad. They went fishing in a pool stocked with crappie and hooked themselves a huge one. Most crappies are a perfect size for the frying pan.
More examplesFewer examplesCrappie fishing has been pretty good as water temperatures stay low.Keeping the crappie whole and searing it helps keep in moisture and eliminates the waste you might get when butchering the fish.
